name: PindropVoiceIntelligenceReport
0:
”Alexa, open Pindrop.”
”Alexa, ask Pindrop what is the fraud rate in banking?”
”Alexa, ask Pindrop to tell me about IVR attacks.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pindrop
des: Pindrop's annual fraud report is now a skill! Now you can ask Pindrop to learn about fraud rates and emerging trends & threats across various industries, including: Insurance, Banks, Retail, Card Issuers, and Brokerages.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
